dataArray.name: Languages
bullets: **Extensive Knowledge:** TypeScript and Javascript with both browser and NodeJS, Java, HTML
**Knowledge:** Python, Objective C, C++, Visual Basic, Lua

dataArray.name: Databases
bullets: **Extensive Knowledge:** SQL (Mostly Postgres but also used Oracle, Microsoft)
**Knowledge:** NoSQL Databases (Mongo and Realm on mobile devices)

dataArray.name: Frameworks
bullets: **Extensive Knowledge:** Express, Sequelize, React, Joi, AJV (JSON Schema)

dataArray.name: Mobile Platforms
bullets: Some cross platform knowledge using React Native, Appcelerator, CrankUI

dataArray.name: Miscellaneous
bullets: **Knowledge:** Automated Testing using frameworks such as Mocha, Jest, Selenium, Cucumber, Super Test
**Development Preference:** Developing on a linux VM using VSCode remote SSH plugin where possible
Ability to utilize and adapt to new technologies; to learn independently
